
API Reference
--------------

neuropredict (designed with the goal of not needing the user to code) is designed primarily be working on the command line.
Hence, it is recommended to follow :doc:`usage_cli`, although you can peek into its internal API and provide us with any feedback you may have.

.. automodule:: run_workflow
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
